title: Barney's of New York hand printed script
content:
Love this font from the [Barney’s](http://web.archive.org/web/20080507180924/http:/www.barneys.com/) website! :)

Please tell me it’s not custom and it’s available for me to buy. :-D Does anyone happen to recognize it? :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080507180924im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/cerilenebarney_3993.jpg)

Thanks so much for your help :)

 [‹ (x) Nestea logo - based on Friz Quadrata {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080507180924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19621 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Contemporary" straight sided sans - FF DIN (Mittelschrift) {Goran Soderstrom} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080507180924/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19615 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Cerilene Hazel

comments.content:
[http://typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq/#Q\_15](http://web.archive.org/web/20080507180924/http:/typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq/#Q_15 "http://typophile.com/forums/typeid/faq/#Q\_15")

but maybe someone can ID it for you.
